summary: A Twitter thread discussing allegations that Jeffrey Epstein admitted to knowing about Ghislaine Maxwell supplying underage girls at a party, specifically referencing a 2011 Kleiner holiday party. The thread includes a user claiming to have been at the party and aware of the allegations at the time.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced in a tweet as having admitted to knowing about Ghislaine Maxwell supplying underage girls for sex at a party.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Alleged in a tweet to have been supplying underage girls for sex at a party attended by the tweet author.

connections.description: Epstein is described as admitting to knowing about Maxwell's alleged activity of supplying underage girls for sex.

events.title: Kleiner holiday party
events.description: A holiday party hosted by Kleiner where Ghislaine Maxwell was present. A Twitter user claims attendees knew about Maxwell allegedly supplying underage girls for sex.

keyFacts: A Twitter user alleges Jeffrey Epstein admitted to knowing about Ghislaine Maxwell supplying underage girls for sex at a party.
The user references a specific event: the Kleiner holiday party in 2011.
The user claims to have been at the 2011 party and states that attendees were aware of the allegations about Maxwell at that time.
